page.title: 07THE BLACKSMITH (1 of 2)
page.content: {HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN A BLACKSMITH? WELL ABOUT 13 YEARS. {AS A BLACKSMITH DO YOU HAVE OTHER {WROUGHT IRON WORK? NO, I DEAL PURELY IN HORSES,AND NOTHING ELSE. {IS THERE ALOT OF WORK ABOUT? TREMENDOUS AMOUNT,THERES FAR MORE WORK AROUND THAN THERE USED TO BE,SO MUCH WE CAN'T HANDLE IT. {IS THERE MORE WORK THAN THERE WAS {YEARS AGO? DEPENDS ON WHAT YOU MEAN BY YEARS AGO.WHEN THE HORSES WERE ON THE FARMS THERE WAS A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT.I SAY THERE ARE MORE HORSES ABOUT NOW . {HOW FAR DO YOU HAVE TO TRAVEL FOR YOUR {WORK?}I COVER FROM CROMER DOWN TO YARMOUTH.INLAND TO NORWICH TO WYMONDHAM.SO IF WE TAKE NORWICH AS A CENTRE BASE I COVER ABOUT A 20 MILE RADIUS
